items.sentence: Tom feels a little better after taking the medicine the doctor prescribed.
Just because Tom said he didn\'t do that doesn\'t mean he didn\'t do that.
I can\'t make a decision on the spot. I\'ll have to talk to my boss first.
I can\'t stand it any longer. Turn that music off. It\'s driving me crazy.
I can\'t tell you how happy I am that you\'ve decided to join our company.
Can you think of anybody who might be willing to teach my children French?
Everyone in the office was impressed with the way Tom handled the problem.
Tom assumed that Mary would have the work finished by the time he arrived.
Tom said he didn\'t know when he was supposed to meet Mary at the airport.
Tom certainly made it clear that he didn\'t want Mary to attend the party.
Tom couldn\'t possibly have known that Mary was the one who got him fired.
I\'m sure that Tom won\'t be able to understand what we\'re talking about.
Tom used to always wear a watch, but now he just looks at his smart phone.
Would you have some time on Monday to come over and help me move my piano?
Tom not only denied that he was Mary\'s friend, but that he even knew her.
When I entered the room, Tom and Mary were snuggled together on the couch.
Tom doesn\'t want to open the box, but he wants to know what\'s inside it.
Tom got tired of waiting for Mary, so he went into the museum without her.
How confident are you that they\'ll get these repairs completed by Monday?
Tom hasn\'t seen Mary more than five or six time in the past twelve years.
I should be studying French, but it\'s more fun hanging out with you guys.
Tom would probably be disappointed if we didn\'t go to his birthday party.
If Tom had been speaking French, I would have been able to understand him.
Tom agrees that Mary should do most of the driving on their upcoming trip.
Tom always seems to be very busy and doesn\'t seem to have much free time.
I still think it\'s unlikely that we\'ll ever find someone to replace Tom.
What is important is seldom urgent and what is urgent is seldom important.
Mary isn\'t as beautiful as her sister, but she\'s still quite attractive.
I\'d like to go through just one day without being told I need to grow up.
Tom said he didn\'t know that Mary wasn\'t able to speak French very well.
Tom took one more look at Mary\'s picture and then threw it into the fire.
I usually eat two or three eggs for breakfast at least three times a week.
Tom deposited three thousand dollars in the bank just before closing time.
Tom thinks it would be better not to change dollars into yen at this time.
Tom told me that he thought the dress that Mary was wearing was too short.
Tom finally had to get a restraining order because Mary kept stalking him.
Tom didn\'t know he didn\'t have enough time to do what needed to be done.
The best way to ruin a good cup of coffee is to put cream and sugar in it.
Tom just couldn\'t stop himself from eating the whole bag of potato chips.
Do you think there's any possibility that the embargo will be lifted soon?
What are some books that you think all of your friends have probably read?
What's something that you'd really like to learn how to do before you die?
It is absurd to believe that young children can run faster than policemen.
That job was not very interesting, but on the other hand it was well paid.
Tom's manager reprimanded him for not treating his customers with respect.
It's an act of treason to sell military secrets to your country's enemies.
I'm sorry that I'm late, but I had a lot of things that needed to be done.
All of the children were crying and some of the teachers were crying, too.
I spent the whole night thinking about all the things that I needed to do.
Tom and Mary said that they weren't planning to get married any time soon.
